# **Asia-Pacific**

```{r,  echo=FALSE}
nsds_status_for_download %>% 
  download_this(
    output_name = "nsds_status_table",
    output_extension = ".xlsx",
    button_label = "Download full data as xlsx",
    button_type = "primary",
    has_icon = TRUE,
    icon = "fa fa-save",
    class = "hvr-sweep-to-left"
  )
```

<br>

```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
nsds_asia_pacific %>% 
  mutate(Status = ifelse(Status == "Expired", cell_spec("Expired", bold = T, color = "white", background = "FireBrick"), 
                         ifelse(Status == "Implementation", cell_spec("Implementation", bold = T, color = "white", background = "SeaGreen"),
                                ifelse(Status == "Completed, awaiting adoption", cell_spec("Completed, awaiting adoption", bold = T, color = "white", background = "DarkMagenta"), Status)))) %>%
  knitr::kable("html", escape = FALSE, booktabs = TRUE) %>% 
  kable_styling(full_width = F, bootstrap_options = c("hover", "condensed")) 
```
